name: Love Tester
description:
Finally a love tester for our new modern digital age!

Navigate the maze with a partner to determine your compatibility!

Whisper your secret crush to the computer to determine your compatibility level using ＲＡＷ ＳＣＩＥＮＣＥ！

Have your fortune told by the mysterious MASTER OF HEARTS!

Control the game using the mouse. Once you've got your results, click to return to the menu.
ESCAPE quits the game.
Press F to toggle fullscreen.

Music from nosoapradio.us
